summary: The implementation partially addresses the requirements but is incomplete. REQ-31 (frontend audit) shows evidence of corrections to flag questions in frontend/src/data/questions.ts with corrected correctAnswerIndex values and documentation. However, the diff is truncated showing only ~14 flag questions when 50+ were expected. REQ-32 (backend update) shows only 3 flag question mappings in backend/main.mo instead of the 50+ needed to align with the corrected frontend data.

missing_requirements.requirement: All 50+ flag questions have been reviewed and corrected where mismatches exist
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only approximately 14 flag questions in the truncated frontend/src/data/questions.ts file. The BuildRequest specified 50+ flag questions should be reviewed and corrected, but the visible evidence shows far fewer questions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend Map entries for flag questions match the corrected frontend correctAnswer values for all 50+ questions
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo file shows only 3 flag question mappings (indices 0, 1, 2) in the flagQuestions Map, while the BuildRequest and frontend indicate 50+ flag questions exist. The backend is missing mappings for the vast majority of flag questions.
